screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .indd file in Adobe InDesign 2023
screenshot.caption: INDD file open in Adobe InDesign 2023

description: Adobe InDesign is a well-known application used to design professional layouts for digital and print publishing. When you save a page layout with InDesign, the application creates an INDD file to store the contents of the design.

To create an INDD file with InDesign, select File → New → Document... , modify the document, then select File → Save As... . After saving an INDD file, you can close it, re-open it, and continue editing the document.
When your design is complete, and you no longer need to edit it in InDesign, you can export it to another format, such as .PDF , .EPUB , or .JPEG . To export an INDD file, select File → Export... .

images.alt: Screenshot of a .indd file in Adobe InDesign 2023
